Author: Nikolas.Glushe
Title: [ANN]Dropil - Next Gen Cryptocurrency Investments & Retirement Plans - PRESALE!
Body: Dear Dropil  community. We are pleased to inform you about our project https://dtalk.top/ which logs all important telegram chats related to Dropil . We believe that Dropil  Chats will be a valuable addition to the Dropil  ecosystem. During the work of the site, we have already received a large number of positive feedback from community members. The project is under active development. The project has its own team of programmers, ready at any time to solve new technical problems and make new improvements.  What is implemented at the moment: You can read your favorite sites in a convenient form for you through https://dtalk.top/ The site is optimized for work and on mobile devices. There is a search by keyword and date. It is possible to read the chat you want in your native language using Google Translate. The translation is not perfect, but it will allow you to receive the latest news as quickly as possible from the first sources.  In the near future, we plan to add the ability to share a specific telegram post in social networks. On the one hand, this will allow you to share interesting content with your friends and subscribers, and on the other hand, it will positively influence the development of Dropil ’s popularity in general.  There is a lot of work ahead, we have planned a huge number of interesting and useful improvements. If you have any suggestions for improving our site, please write - we will try to take everything into account and use it in the further development of the site.  If you think that some important chat related to Dropil  is missing on our website, please write and we will add it.

Title: [ANN]Dropil - Next Gen Cryptocurrency Investments & Retirement Plans - PRESALE!
Body: One little nuance I find quite interesting about Dex and DROPs is that if the coin devalues you actually end up making more DROPs, because the 15 day return cycles are dollar valued. i.e. you earn about 8% per month of DROPs in dollar value, so if they go down in value you earn more DROPs. IF Dropil has a bot they would never disclose the code publicly since their entire company is based off that bot. As with all great projects Dropil had a few hiccups the first week or so after launch, but everything was resolved quickly and smoothly.  If you have trouble contacting support try joining the telegram group and messaging @jmcalpine   @zmatar   @Vanko_McCoin   @PatrickDropil @DropilChris message them by typing those names into the dropil group chat with your message or searching those names in the group(without the @) and you should see the admin symbol next to them click there name and then send message. Dropil has already hit the top 100 on CMC, #87 was as high/low as it went.  Telegram: https://t.me/DropilCoin  This is my progress with DEX having invested 500$ at the start:  (Current Invest Into DEX: $529)  3 Year Projection(without re-invest factored in keep in mind): https://i.imgur.com/PseoWGf  1 Hour Returns: https://imgur.com/TK95v1C  1 Day Returns: https://imgur.com/PeXHfaF  15 Day Returns: https://imgur.com/LGjTP5r  I fully believe in the work that Dropil is doing and the team! Dropil has been amazing so far and will continue to be everything I hope it to be. I'm looking to further my position into dex in the next couple of days so I will possibly post those numbers when I get them.

Author: sergemoz
Title: [ANN]Dropil - Next Gen Cryptocurrency Investments & Retirement Plans - PRESALE!
Body: Although I love the whole idea and how Zach demonstrated the platform's features, I have to point out that the rollout of Dex and Arthur was rather premature. I deposited my 10k drops and used them on Dex, but I don't see anything that can let me know how Dex is working and using my deposited drops. After depositing drops the deposit page does not change at all and still asks to deposit more. I can see in the dashboard that my drops have been successfully deposited into Dex, but I have know idea what my money is doing in the background. That would be acceptable if this was some alpha or beta version test of Dex, but not when you roll it out.  Secondly Arthur still does not let me use its features even though Arthur has been live for some time. It still has that same message telling me that to use it I have to have $50 worth of drops in my wallet or in Dex, which i do.  So at the moment I'm not very happy with the way it is working.  Zach, Jeremy and Patrick, please plan your next roll-out differently, where the investor will feel more secure about their investment.  Thank you for your work.

Author: Dropil
Title: [ANN]Dropil - Next Gen Cryptocurrency Investments & Retirement Plans - PRESALE!
Body: Click to go to Dropil.com  ICO IS LIVE  ICO Price: $0.0050 per DROP  15 Billion DROP's are available for Crowdsale  $100 Minimum for ICO  What is Dropil?  Dropil focuses on innovative technologies for autonomous & intelligent trading by investing in the cryptocurreny world.  We are helping investors net the highest returns, with the lowest risk, requiring minimum effort, in an all in one easy to use suite with intuitive reporting.   Click Here for WhitePaper   How does it work?  1. Purchase Drops through our ICO or through an exchange after the ICO has ended.   2. Invest your drops into the Dex bot which nets returns according to the risk level you set.   3. Watch returns come in through your user portal.  4. Setup auto-reinvesting for long-term investments or cash out your investment ANY TIME through an exchange or in the future our portal.   ICO Coin Distribution  We have generated a total supply of 30 billion Drops.  50% of all Drops will be available to purchase during the ICO.     Our Roadmap  We are bringing the right people together to transform Dropil into a industry standard for next generation investment plans.  We have an extensive and easily reachable roadmap thanks to our brilliant team.   See our Roadmap on our Website HERE  ICO Presale Begins - January 26th, 2018  Dropil ICO goes live - February 7th, 2018  ICO Sale Ends - March 7th, 2018  DROPs Distributed to Users & Investment Platform Launches - March 10th, 2018  ntegrate DROPs Into Small Public Exchanges  - March, 2018 and Beyond  Mobile Wallets for Popular Mobile Operating Systems  - April- May, 2018  High Limit Investment Implementation - April - June, 2018  Integrate DROPs Into Large Public Exchanges - April, 2018 and beyond  Begin Discussions on Retirement Plan Implementation in Common Careers - Q3 2018 and Beyond   FAQ  Q: Do you require a “hold period” before I can withdraw my coins? A: No, for any reason, at any time you are in control of your coins and may withdraw them.  Q: Are there benefits if I refer people? A: In short no, during normal operations there is no incentive offered from the company for referrals (There is an exception only during ICO for referrals, and for these there is no hold time, or minimum stipulations - the affiliate will be paid 5%, in drops, of the referrals first deposit).  Q: Are "Drops" tokens the only way to use the service, can I send USD, BTC, or other currency instead? A: Yes, Drops are required and the only currency accepted for use of the investment services.  Q: Why is the use of Drop required? A: Reason Drops are required: 1. To control the volume of assets managed by the smart investment algorithms. While the bots are able to make substantial returns on massive volume, there is a point of diminishing returns, and as such there is a hard cap in place to ensure all investors receive optimal portfolio performance. 2. The cap on the overall number of Drops ensures that value of the token also increases, which further benefits our customers, especially those who are long term investors. 3. By managing all in and out funds via Drops, all customers are free to cash out their Drops at partner exchanges into whatever currency suits them best. All transactions taking place in Drops also allows us to protect the anonymity and privacy of our customers.  Q: Do you have any back test data? A: We have back test and live data available.  Q: How long you guys have tested and what is the performance? A: Dex is actually a lot of bots, they all run and are controlled by an overarching strategy. The returns have always been very strong and even more importantly, reliable; depending on logic historically we have seen 2-6% gains per 30-day period. There is approximately a year of testing from our oldest, and still being used, logic.  Q: What crypto coins is the bot buying and trading? A: The coins being traded varies from strategy and market conditions, over 90% of trading is done among the following currencies.  Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Z-Cash, Bitcoin Cash, Monero, Neo, and Dash.  For more FAQ information please visit our site: Click Here for FAQ  Socials:   Facebook   Twitter   Telegram   Reddit  For any questions please feel free to ask or contact us on our website through or through our portal Dex

Author: yhoga45
Title: [ANN]Dropil - Next Gen Cryptocurrency Investments & Retirement Plans - PRESALE!
Body: Hope you guys success to list Dropil to many exchanges. Unfortunately, I have no money for this good project. I’m really appreciate for you dev think this project. But I have question, correct me if I’m wrong, is Dropil same with Bitconnect? Thanks. Success guys

Author: Dropil
Title: [ANN]Dropil - Next Gen Cryptocurrency Investments & Retirement Plans - PRESALE!
Body: We actually share almost no common grounds with Bitconnect or similar models at all, but we would love feedback on what gave this impression so we can work at making our product offering more clear for others in the future.  Until then, here are some key differences.  We are not a lending service, and have no plan to become one.  In Dex you do NOT benefit, need, or even have the option, to have any down-line accounts, i.e. referrals, affiliates, or any pyramid structure at all.  There is no hold period on your funds at all; you may withdraw them at any time, and incur no fee.  The returns “promised” by many of these other services are too good to be true, we have significant experience with algo-based trading and have yet to see an option that can make the massive returns, to the large user base, scaled to large capital amounts, sustainable over a long period of time, match the profit these companies claim.  We do not grantee any specific numbers, this is after all trading and it cannot be 100% certain ever, however we do have plenty of historical data to estimate with accuracy expected returns and as you will see they are quite reasonable while still being very attractive relative to input required.   An amazing trader will always be able to beat an algorithm trader, and any bot claimed to be better is suspect.  Our product is not for the top 5% of traders, they don’t need it, out product if for the rest of the population, that does not have time, skills, or interest in full time trading but still wants a decent return on their investment.  To be very clear about the affiliate issue, we do offer one ONLY during the ICO period, and it is a simple incentive to spread awareness, when the system is live there is no benefit from having signed others up even during the ICO on your future trading.    Thanks for your interest!

Author: Dropil
Title: [ANN]Dropil - Next Gen Cryptocurrency Investments & Retirement Plans - PRESALE!
Body: The presale has been moved to Friday the 26th of January.  Please read below:  In order to offer the highest level of security for the company’s continued legal operation without possible interference due to the uncertain regulatory nature currently surrounding the United States for cryptocurrency, Dropil will operate as an IBC going forward. This changes nothing on the user end of the operations. In order to complete all associated legal filings prior to accepting funds for participation in the ICO we must regrettably push back the start date of the presale to Friday the 26th.    Thank you.
